entity.name: Sarah Huckabee Sanders
entity.description: White House Press Secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders

text:
@PressSec Jun 20: Attends Trump's rally without a mask.
Jul 1: Tweets that people are fed up and won't wear masks anymore.
Jul 2: Checks into the hospital with Coronavirus.
After a long hell of 4 weeks he has passed.
All avoidable. https://t.co/LfP87BXdYA
